title: The Road to One Day Be the Strongest - Novel Updates
tags: Alternate World   Demon Lord   Demons   Dragon Slayers   Dragons   Goddesses   Godly Powers   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Heroes   Humanoid Protagonist   Level System   Loli   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Nobles   Royalty   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Vampires
author: Aizawa Tateru   藍澤建
description: I thought that if I went to another world I could achieve a cheat harem. Although my body has been transformed and I have strong abilities, I am not invincible and my opponents are legendary and mythical creatures. This is the story of how I may one day become the strongest.>
